mapper.select: SELECT SUM(F.PRICE * C.FOOD_COUNT) AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM CART C LEFT JOIN FOOD_INFOR F ON C.FOOD_NO = F.NO WHERE USER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: SELECT SEQ_ORDER_STATUS_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO ORDER_STATUS (NO, STATUS) VALUES (#{orderStatusNo}, #{orderStatus})
